H0.text: In which year did Nick Faldo win both the Open and the US Masters Championships. 1987

H1.text: In which year did Nick Faldo win both the Open and the US Masters Championships. 1989

H2.text: In which year did Nick Faldo win both the Open and the US Masters Championships. 1991

H3.text: In which year did Nick Faldo win both the Open and the US Masters Championships. 1990

A4.text: Faldo won three Open Championships (1987, 1990, 1992) and three Masters (1989, 1990, 1996).

A5.text: Faldo's three Masters titles include a win in 1990, the same year he won the Open Championship.
